name: Explore the Darkness
description:
------------------Controls-----------------------
---Keyboard 
WASD movement Mouse Aim
Left Click Swing Sword
 Right Click to fire Gun
 F to Place Lantern
 C to place warp point
 ESC to pause
---Controller
Left Joystick movement Mouse Aim
Bottom Button Swing Sword 
 Right Trigger to fire Gun 
 Right Button to Place Lantern
 Left Button to place warp point
 ----------------------------------------------------
